name: OR_CASE_ISOLATST
description: The OR_CASE_ISOLATST table contains OR management system case patient isolation status.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the isolation information for the case.

columns.name: ISOLATION_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value indication the isolation status for the patient.
